data.name: Lost2
data.detailed_description:
This is a casual puzzle point-and-click puzzle game. You can click on the corresponding item to solve the puzzle according to the prompts in the game.
The game has a variety of interesting ways to solve puzzles, such as puzzles, leveling, color matching, etc.
The game is adapted from fairy tales, with many metaphors and hints, please observe the game screen carefully, use your imagination, and explore the puzzles!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
